statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ -9 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 11 \\ 19 \\ 7 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
